characters.name: Ichirou Inuyashiki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 167 cm

At first glance, Ichirou is a timid man who rarely likes to speak out, which is evident in the way that his family treats him. He retreats into cowardice and melancholy when behaviors such as hatred, selfishness, rudeness or bullying come into his way. His introversion, however, is in conflict with his need to help and support all those around him. ~! When he receives his powers he becomes a bit braver than originally perceived at the beginning of the story. !~

Ichirou is a middle-aged man who has been diagnosed with stomach cancer the day after moving to his new house. After finding out that he's not going to live for a long time, he runs away to a park to cry.

~! Unfortunately for him, a UFO hit the Earth on that park, killing him and a boy in the process. The aliens did not intend to kill any intelligent life and decided to rebuild his body. The Aliens only had weapons and offensive materials, and in a hurry they moved Ichirou's consciousness into a new body, which is a weapon-unit robot. !~

~! At the end of the series when an asteroid is about the hit the earth and destroy it, Inuyashiki self-destructs himself after Hiro and changes the trajectory of the asteroid, ultimately saving the mankind. !~

characters.name: Hiro Shishigami
characters.description:
This young man cares about his childhood friend Ando and his mother more than anyone, but is completely indifferent to anyone else. Just like Inuyashiki, Shishigami got a mechanical body after being involved in the same UFO accident, but unlike Inuyashiki, he uses his powers to commit crimes in order to feel alive.
~! In the end he self destructs himself to change the trajectory of the asteroid that was about to hit the earth and destroy it. !~

characters.name: Naoyuki Andou
characters.description: Shishigami’s childhood friend and the only person outside of his family he can open up to. His nickname is Chokko. He had become a shut-in due to his classmates bullying him because of his pushover personality, but teams up with Inuyashiki to stop Shishigami when he goes on a crime spree after obtaining a mechanical body.

characters.name: Mari Inuyashiki
characters.description:
Mari Inuyashiki is a high school student, the daughter of Ichirou Inuyashiki and Marie Inuyashiki and the older sister of Takeshi Inuyashiki.

Mari is a tall and skinny pale-skinned young girl with straight waist-length black hair that is styled in a muffin top with bangs hanging over her eyebrows, black eyes and full pink lips.

When Mari was little, she was really close to her father and she was always holding his hand, which was to the extent where she would be worried that he would die soon due to him looking quite old for his age, reaching the point where she suggested getting cosmetic surgery. Now, she hardly talks to him as she got older, ~!although they become close again once she is saved towards the end of the series.!~

characters.name: Takeshi Inuyashiki
characters.description:
Takeshi Inuyashiki is the son of Ichirou Inuyashiki and Marie Inuyashiki and the younger brother of Mari Inuyashiki.

Takeshi is bullied at school due to his personality, which leads to him displaying symptoms of depression. ~!At the end, he finally stand up for himself and fight off two bullies before he looks up at the sky hoping his dad is watching.!~

characters.name: Yuuko Shishigami
characters.description:
Hiro Shishigami's mother.

~! She was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer but Hiro heals it with his powers. !~ 

~! She commits suicide out of the guilt of the crimes committed by her son. !~

characters.name: Hanako
characters.description: Hanako is the adopted dog of the Inuyashiki Family.

characters.name: Oda no Chichi
characters.description: A famous manga author. He lives in a big house next to the Inuyashikis.

characters.name: Ojisan
characters.description: Homeless man featured in episode 1. He loves his (presumably estranged) wife Toshie.
